model_response.text: Prosciutto, goat cheese, and the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are mentioned in the context of providing examples to illustrate the importance of designing systems so that interfaces are horizontal instead of vertical, allowing the lower levels to be worked on independently without needing to agree with the upper levels.
